info.author: Rangoli Saxena
info.description: ## mapfost mapfost is a python implementation of the autofocus method MAPFoST introduced in the publication Binding J, Mikula S, Denk W. Low-dosage Maximum-A-Posteriori Focusing and Stigmation. Microsc Microanal. 2013 ## Installation Use the package manager pip to install mapfost ```bash pip install mapfost ``` ## Usage ```python from src.mapfost import mapfost as mf res = mf.est_aberr([test_im1, test_im2]) ``` ## Example run the script run_sample.py ```python python /src/example/run_sample.py ``` Expected output is a scipy.optimize.minimize object (as shown below).\ The x key in the following object is the estimated aberration vector. ```python fun: -18822048750862.973 hess_inv: <3x3 LbfgsInvHessProduct with dtype=float64> jac: array([ 3906250.02374012, -5468749.9990838 , -1171875.00061682]) message: 'CONVERGENCE: REL_REDUCTION_OF_F_<=_FACTR*EPSMCH' nfev: 80 nit: 12 njev: 20 status: 0 success: True x: array([2.11, 0.05, 0.16]) ``` ## License [MIT](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit/)
info.name: mapfost
info.summary: Implementation of the autofocus method MAPFoSt. Publication: Binding J, Mikula S, Denk W. Low-dosage Maximum-A-Posteriori Focusing and Stigmation. Microsc Microanal. 2013
